-- 임시 table 생성 WITH pfm_view AS (SELECT P.*, ps.stored_name poster_name, H.hall_name, COUNT(S.seat_idx) hall_cnt FROM PERFORMANCE P LEFT JOIN seat S ON P.hall_idx = S.hall_idx LEFT JOIN hall H ON P.hall_idx = H.hall_idx LEFT JOIN poster_info ps ON P.pfm_idx = ps.pfm_idx WHERE ( P.genre_idx = #{genreIdx } AND ( (ticket_start BETWEEN TRUNC(#{start },'dd') AND TRUNC(#{end },'dd')) OR (ticket_end BETWEEN TRUNC(#{start },'dd') AND TRUNC(#{end },'dd')) OR (TRUNC(#{start },'dd') BETWEEN ticket_start AND ticket_end) OR (TRUNC(#{end },'dd') BETWEEN ticket_start AND ticket_end) ) ) GROUP BY P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date , ps.stored_name, H.hall_name )
-- 결과 구하기 SELECT res.pfm_idx, res.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, hall_idx, age_grade_idx, running_time, res.create_date, poster_name, hall_name , nvl(book_cnt/nullif(COUNT(dbt.pfm_date),0)/nullif(hall_cnt,0) *100 , 0) AS booking_rate FROM ( SELECT P.*, nvl(b.book_cnt, 0) AS book_cnt FROM pfm_view P LEFT JOIN ( SELECT pfm_idx, COUNT(*) AS book_cnt FROM book WHERE pfm_idx IN (SELECT pfm_idx FROM pfm_view) AND book_cate_idx = 1 AND TRUNC(create_date,'dd') BETWEEN #{start } AND #{end } GROUP BY pfm_idx ) b ON b.pfm_idx = P.pfm_idx ORDER BY book_cnt DESC, hall_cnt DESC ) res LEFT JOIN pfm_datebytime dbt ON res.pfm_idx = dbt.pfm_idx AND dbt.pfm_date >= TRUNC(#{start },'dd') GROUP BY res.pfm_idx, res.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, hall_idx, age_grade_idx, running_time, res.create_date, poster_name, hall_name, hall_cnt, book_cnt ORDER BY booking_rate DESC
